text:
DeepMap.ai | Palo Alto, CA | Full-Time & Interns, Onsite | https://deepmap.ai/

DeepMap builds high-resolution maps for autonomous vehicles.

We are looking for hardware and software engineers in multiple areas (computer vision, GIS, infrastructure, embedded) who are excited about the future of autonomous vehicles.

A subset of our open positions are here: https://www.linkedin.com/jobs/search/?f_C=10679715. If you're interested but don't find an exact match, please email me anyways at <my username>@deepmap.ai
